thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 104 of 3780
thread.title: Norman

author: Norman
title: Norman
text: The book I ordered is a little hard to find and they had it at a good price. First time I ordered the process didn't complete. I didn't get a response that the purchase went through. I e-mailed and they told me to reorder that it din't go through but they didn't know why. Reordered and everything was good. Recieved the book within a week and it was just has they said in the discription. I would certainly do bussiness with them again
